title: problems problems with league now days
body: can anyone help through this my league is constantly dcing in games every single game after this new patch which i got can anyone tell me the problem this is getting on my nerve this is the 7 game i got discoonect with please someone

replies.body:
Well, patches are unlikely to affect your connection because they only  change local files in your install directory. Most of the time, these issues can be resolved by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you still encounter issues, we can take a look at your route to the servers to find any issues along the way.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GyEBbNyg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-02T04:50:27.734+0000)

> If you still encounter issues,w e can take a look at your route to the servers to find any issues along the way.

Believe me, that guide didnt help anythings.
I meet dcer in both team every 4/10 games.
40% is too high for personal problem
even though my internet is working all other things was running but got dc from the league
